title: Best value
comment: I have the insanity Golf EgoCaddy - Chariot de golf électrique Smart Follow Me and works super well and a good autonomy of 36 holes. the mobile application to stop working, I wrote to the technical support of the customer service and they solved the problem by sending the new manual with the new application and everything works much even better than the old one. so 100% satisfaction and I highly recommend... good golf to all
